question: Many students find it difficult to concentrate or pay attention at school. What are the reasons? What could be done?Write an essay giving reasons for your answer and including any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience. Write at least 250 words.
text: Schooling is an inevitable part of one's  life  . Therefore it is crucial to make learning at school enjoyable, so that children are able to pay proper attention in the classroom. However  these day students do not concentrate in educational institutes due to various reasons. This essay will  former scrutinised reasons behind this problem and latter provide possible solutions to overcome such problem.

To commence with the reasons why children are unable to focus on studies in school and First and foremost reason is that use of traditional mode of teaching at schools which makes a learner passive and learning a boring experience because there is less participation by kids and they get easily bored. Secondly,  more use of electronic gadgets is also main reason. Nowadays students Spend most of their time to watching television, using mobile phone and playing video games and this effect their life negatively. Therefore, when they are at an institution and think of these  things and their concentration is affected.

There are possible solution to curb such problems the most prominent one is the introduction of modern modes of teaching such as projector, audio visual aids and smart classes which makes learning playful experience. Secondly, proper counselling must be done to both of kids and parents by the school staffs . Children should  stay away from the electronic devices. Moreover, Feeling of empathy must be inculcated among students so that children are not excluded from others.

To recapitulate, there are several reasons due to students are Unable to pay attention at schools . Nevertheless, introducing the modern modes of teaching and learning with interesting example students' concentration will be improved.
